2. Problem: Manual competitor analysis was extremely time-consuming and prone to errors. The lack of real-time data hindered their ability to adjust pricing strategically and respond to market changes effectively.

4. Implementation: Iceberg Data utilized advanced web scraping techniques and proxy management to ensure reliable data collection. The data was processed using a cloud-based infrastructure and delivered via secure APIs.
